name: Scenario B: Safety-Critical Refurbishment
description: Class III defibrillator with safety failure — triggers regulatory hold and full compliance review, 5 actions (full path)

1.failureDescription: Energy delivery inconsistency detected during routine testing. Device delivering 15-20% below selected energy level on internal discharge test. Potential patient safety risk. Device immediately withdrawn from clinical use per hospital protocol.

2.approvalNotes: Approved with priority. Class III life-critical device — regulatory compliance mandatory. Budget allocated from emergency medical equipment fund. Compliance officer review required before return to service.

3.initialAssessment: Energy delivery board shows component degradation on the high-voltage capacitor charging circuit. Main discharge capacitor ESR within spec but charging circuit components show thermal stress marks. H-bridge switching module requires replacement. Full recalibration and IEC 60601-2-4 compliance testing required post-repair.
3.partsRequired: 1x HV capacitor charging module (Medtronic P/N 3205720-001), 1x H-bridge switching assembly (P/N 3205735-002), 2x energy discharge resistors, 1x calibration reference load set

4.regulatoryConditions: Device must pass full IEC 60601-2-4 (defibrillator-specific) testing post-refurbishment. Energy delivery accuracy must be within +/- 3% at all selectable energy levels (1J-360J). Manufacturer's service bulletin SB-LP15-2024-003 must be applied. Post-repair testing must be conducted by an accredited test laboratory. Documentation of all replaced components with full traceability required.

5.workPerformed: Replaced HV capacitor charging module and H-bridge switching assembly. Applied manufacturer service bulletin SB-LP15-2024-003 (firmware update to v3.7.2). Full recalibration performed across all energy levels (1J-360J). IEC 60601-2-4 defibrillator-specific safety testing completed at accredited lab (MedTest UK Ltd, UKAS cert #12345). All energy levels within +/-2% of selected value. 72-hour cycling test: 500 charge/discharge cycles at maximum energy with zero anomalies.
5.partsReplaced: 1x HV capacitor charging module (Medtronic P/N 3205720-001, S/N CHG-2026-44521), 1x H-bridge switching assembly (P/N 3205735-002, S/N HSW-2026-44522), 2x energy discharge resistors (100ohm 50W, Vishay RH050)
5.testResults: IEC 60601-2-4 FULL COMPLIANCE: PASS. Energy delivery accuracy: 1J=1.01J, 50J=49.8J, 150J=150.4J, 200J=199.7J, 360J=358.9J (all within +/-2%). Charge time at max energy: 8.2s (spec: <10s). Earth leakage: 0.08mA (limit 0.5mA). 500-cycle stress test: PASS. Accredited test lab certificate: MedTest/2026/DEF-0892.
